query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS iot_device_templates (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  device_type ENUM('plc','sensor','gateway','hmi','scada','other') NOT NULL,
  manufacturer VARCHAR(100),
  model VARCHAR(100),
  protocol ENUM('modbus_tcp','modbus_rtu','opc_ua','mqtt','http','tcp','serial') NOT NULL,
  default_config JSON,
  metrics_config JSON,
  alert_thresholds JSON,
  tags JSON,
  icon VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'cpu',
  is_active INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  created_by INT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_iot_templates_device_type (device_type),
  INDEX idx_iot_templates_protocol (protocol)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS iot_device_templates (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  device_type ENUM('plc','sensor','gateway','hmi','scada','other') NOT NULL,
  manufacturer VARCHAR(100),
  model VARCHAR(100),
  protocol ENUM('modbus_tcp','modbus_rtu','opc_ua','mqtt','http','tcp','serial') NOT NULL,
  default_config JSON,
  metrics_config JSON,
  alert_thresholds JSON,
  tags JSON,
  icon VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'cpu',
  is_active INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  created_by INT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_iot_templates_device_type (device_type),
  INDEX idx_iot_templates_protocol (protocol)
);
